alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 2:10PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 245 PM MST... At 209 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Superstition Mountains, or 8 miles northeast of Gold Canyon, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Apache Junction, Saguaro Lake, Canyon Lake, Superstition Mountains, Kings Ranch, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, Usery Mountain Park, Gold Camp, and Tortilla Flat. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Superior
